pageProduct.name: Polident Denture Adhesive Cream Flavour Free 60g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Do you have doubts around wearing dentures?

Whether you're new to dentures (otherwise known as false teeth) or have been using them for years, you probably have some doubts about wearing them. You might be worried about:

• Eating foods that require strong chewing

• Participating in sports

• Talking and laughing in social situations

• Food getting under your dentures causing irritation

The good news is that denture adhesives, also known as denture fixatives, can keep your dentures securely in place. Polident 3D Hold Denture Adhesive gives extra grip (vs. no adhesive) when applied so you can eat, talk and enjoy physical activities with confidence.

Brought to you by Polident, the #1 Brand in Denture Care.*

Available in Fresh mint and Flavour Free

Eat, speak and smile with confidence!

Up to 12 hours of strong hold

Improved denture fit and comfort

Seals out up to 74% more food particles**

**versus no adhesive after 1 hour on a lower full denture

3D hold that secures your dentures

How To Use And Remove Polident 3D Hold Denture Adhesive

Apply Polident adhesive once a day in short strips, not too close to denture edges.

Rinse mouth before inserting dentures.

Press dentures into place then hold firmly and bite down for a few seconds to secure hold.

Swish mouth with warm water, then slowly remove denture.

General Information

Polident Denture Adhesive Cream Flavour Free contains no added flavours or colours.

Wearing dentures is never easy - Want to enhance your denture experience? Try Polident Flavour Free Denture Adhesive Cream.
It holds your dentures whichever way they move: forwards and backwards, up and down, and side to side all day long. Polident Flavour Free is developed not to interfere with the flavour of food so you can enjoy the foods you like most.

How about also trying Polident Daily Cleanser? It removes (when used as directed) 99.9% of odour causing bacteria (in laboratory testing) for a cleaner, fresher and brighter denture.

To find out more visit our website.

Product Claims: No added flavours or colours. Endorsed by the Australian Dental Prosthetists Association.

Size: 60g

Warnings

Keep out of sight and reach of children. A few individuals may be sensitive or allergic to this product. If you experience an allergic reaction or discomfort, discontinue use immediately. Other side effects such as oral irritations and gastrointestinal symptoms (e.g.nausea) may occur. Swallowing small amounts of this product, when used as directed, may occur and is not harmful.

PRECAUTIONS

III-fitting dentures may impair your health. Visit your dentist regularly to check your denture fit. To keep tip from clogging, keep cap and nozzle dry. Refasten cap after use.

Ingredients

Calcium/Sodium PVM/MA Copolymer, Petrolatum, Cellulose Gum, Mineral Oil.

Directions

For the first time, use a small amount, too much can cause oozing; apply less next time if this occurs. It may take a few tries to find the right amount for your denture. Apply once a day for secure hold. If you need to apply more than once a day, seek advice from your dental care professional.

Applying:
1. Apply Polident once a day to clean dry dentures, in short strips as shown, not too close to denture edges.
2. Rinse mouth before inserting dentures, press dentures into place, hold firmly & bite down for a few seconds to secure hold.

Removing:
1. Swish mouth with warm water, then slowly remove denture using a rocking motion.
2. Remove adhesive residue from denture and mouth with warm water & soft brush.
3. Use Polident Daily Cleanser to thoroughly clean your denture & then rinse with water.

USAGE ADVICE

Read directions first.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place.
